Posts.EditableText: Okay, silly question here.  How does one assign a variable so that's it's specificly for the player object.  I've set up a procedure to set player stats,  (strength, dex, iq, health) but if I change them on one player they get changed on any other players.  Obviously I've screwed up and set them as global variables.  I've missed something obvious.  Any help would be appreciated.  : )

Posts.EditableText: You use arrays with the index being the userid. So instead of using a "health" variable, you use "health[userid]".
